original: atharvāṇam ṛṣiṃ devaṃ devahayaśirodharam /
analyzed: atharvāṇam ṛṣim devam deva haya śiraḥ dharam

original: praṇamya sampravakṣyāmi dantyoṣṭhavidhivistaram // 1.1 //
analyzed: praṇamya sampravakṣyāmi dantī oṣṭha vidhi vistaram

original: chandasy adhyayane prāpte viduṣām atha dhīmatām /
analyzed: chandasi adhyayane prāpte viduṣām atha dhīmatām

original: bakāre saṃśayo nityam auṣṭhyaṃ dantyam iti sma ha // 1.2 //
analyzed: bakāre saṃśayaḥ nityam auṣṭhyam dantyam iti sma ha

original: tasmāt tadvidhi nirṇaye saṃśayachedanāya ca /
analyzed: tasmāt tadvidhi nirṇaye saṃśaya chedanāya ca

original: muktā dantyā prayojyāma auṣṭhyān vakṣye kramāhitaḥ // 1.3 //
analyzed: muktāḥ dantyā prayojyāmaḥ auṣṭhyān vakṣye krama āhitaḥ

original: bhaparaṃ yatra dṛśyetāniṃgye sparśanaṃ kva cit /
analyzed: bha param yatra dṛśyeta aniṃgye sparśanam kva cit

original: auṣṭyaṃ tatra pade dhīro bibhīto bibhratīr yathā // 1.4 //
analyzed: auṣṭyam tatra pade dhīraḥ bibhītaḥ bibhratīḥ yathā

original: ādyudātte bale bāṇe bila śabde tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ādi udātte bale bāṇe bila śabde tathā eva ca

original: samaste 'pi yatra syātām antodātto viśiṣyate // 1.5 //
analyzed: samaste pi yatra syātām anta udāttaḥ viśiṣyate  /

original: baladābalānugrāhabaladhanvā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: balada abala anugrāha baladhanvā tathā eva ca

original: balāsaṃ bāhū ācāryāḥ sarvāsv eva vibhaktiṣu // 1.6 //
analyzed: balāsam bāhū ācāryāḥ sarvāsu eva vibhaktiṣu

original: balī balena barhiś cābalena balīyase /
analyzed: balī balena barhiḥ ca abalena balīyase

original: bradhnaḥ kilbiṣaṃ vaḥ ketuḥ kumbaṃ bādhiṣṭa bāliti // 1.7 //
analyzed: bradhnaḥ kilbiṣam vaḥ ketuḥ kumbam bādhiṣṭa bāliti  /

original: bāhuṃ bohi tathā baṃdhur bahubādhe bṛhac ca yat /
analyzed: bāhum tathā baṃdhuḥ bahu bādhe bṛhat ca yat

original: pibati bruvate caiva yathārthāḥ samprakīrttitāḥ // 1.8 //
analyzed: pibati bruvate ca eva yathā arthāḥ samprakīrttitāḥ

original: bastavāsino bāhvaṃkair bāhuvīrye tathaiva ca /
analyzed: bastavāsinaḥ bāhu aṃkaiḥ bāhu vīrye tathā eva ca

original: bahavaḥ kābavaṃ bāhvor bodha bahve tathaiva ca // 1.9 //
analyzed: bahavaḥ bāhvoḥ bodha tathā eva ca

original: tathāa badhnyaṃ tābuvaṃ bahvīr navamaḥ saṃprakīrttitāḥ /
analyzed: badhnyam tābuvam bahvīḥ navamaḥ saṃprakīrttitāḥ

original: ete sarveṣu śabdeṣu prathamasparśyā hi matāḥ // 1.10 //
analyzed: ete sarveṣu śabdeṣu prathama sparśyāḥ hi matāḥ

original: vaibādha devabandhuṃ ca vibaddhas tu vibandhuṣu /
analyzed: vaibādha devabandhum ca vibaddhaḥ tu vibandhuṣu

original: dvitīya sparśyo vijñeyo vibabādhe tathaiva ca // 1.11 //
analyzed: dvitīya sparśyaḥ vijñeyaḥ vibabādhe tathā eva ca

original: bāhau bāhavo bahulaṃ budhnyaṃ baddhkam eva ca /
analyzed: bāhau bāhavaḥ bahulam budhnyam baddhkam eva ca

original: ete sarve bhavanty oṣṭhyā ye noktās te tu dantajāḥ // 1.12 //
analyzed: ete sarve bhavanti oṣṭhyāḥ ye na uktāḥ te tu danta jāḥ  /

original: iti prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ /
analyzed: iti prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: adharād uttare bhāge bhāgāt prativibhāgaśaḥ /
analyzed: adharāt uttare bhāge bhāgāt prativibhāgaśaḥ

original: daśanāgreṇa saṃspṛṣṭyo na tu pīḍāsu yojayet // 2.1 //
analyzed: daśana agreṇa saṃspṛṣṭyaḥ na tu pīḍāsu yojayet  /

original: kambalaṃ balbajaṃ bījaṃ libujā baṇmhāṃ asi /
analyzed: kambalam balbajam bījam libujā asi

original: biṣkale brahma barjahye śabale bedhiṣe bayaḥ // 2.2 //
analyzed: biṣkale brahma barjahye śabale bedhiṣe bayaḥ

original: bahiṣṭhaḥ budhnyaḥ paḍbīśam arbudaṃ badhiras tathā /
analyzed: bahiṣṭhaḥ budhnyaḥ paḍbīśam arbudam badhiraḥ tathā

original: ābayobinduḥ saṃbiṃbaṃ kāhābām udumbalam // 2.3 //
analyzed: ā abayaḥ binduḥ saṃbiṃbam kāha ābām udumbalam

original: kabru pībasi baṃdhuraṃ kaṃbūkāṃ balinas tathā /
analyzed: kabru pībasi baṃdhuram kaṃbūkām balinaḥ tathā

original: kuberaḥ stambajaṃ babhraupabdaiḥ paribedhire // 2.4 //
analyzed: kuberaḥ stamba jam babhraupabdaiḥ paribedhire  /

original: asaṃbādhe nairbādhyena baddhe buddhāni kulbajaṃ /
analyzed: asaṃbādhe nairbādhyena baddhe buddhāni kulbajam

original: bato batāsi bandhuṃ ca bisaṃ klībaṃ buje bujaḥ // 2.5 //
analyzed: bataḥ bata asi bandhum ca bisam klībam buje bujaḥ

original: badhāna prābaṃdhāyāś colbaṃ kāberkas tathā /
analyzed: badhāna prābaṃdhāyāḥ ca ulbam kāberkaḥ tathā

original: ābedhur ailabaś caivābedhe balhikāni ca // 2.6 //
analyzed: ābedhuḥ ailabaḥ ca eva ābedhe balhikāni ca

original: abodhi bārhatsāme ghoṣabuddhā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: abodhi bārhatsāme ghoṣabuddhā tathā eva ca

original: baṃdhanaṃ yatra śeṣaṃ syād ābadhe me nidraśanam // 2.7 //
analyzed: baṃdhanam yatra śeṣam syāt me

original: alābu bajaḥ bāṇaṃ syād ādyudātto yadā bhavet /
analyzed: alābu bajaḥ bāṇam syāt ādi udāttaḥ yadā bhavet

original: brahma śabdaṃ tu sarvārtham auṣṭhyam eva vidur budhāḥ // 2.8 //
analyzed: brahma śabdam tu sarva artham auṣṭhyam eva viduḥ budhāḥ

original: chubukābdaṣkaye bāle keśabāle tathaiva ca /
analyzed: chubuka abdaṣkaye bāle keśa bāle tathā eva ca

original: adhibāle vayaḥ proktaḥ śeṣeṣu parimāṇataḥ // 2.9 //
analyzed: adhibāle vayaḥ proktaḥ śeṣeṣu parimāṇataḥ  /

original: bibhed ādiṣu bhedāś ca pari pūrvaṃ bale tathā /
analyzed: bibhet ādiṣu bhedāḥ ca pari pūrvam bale tathā

original: baṃdhu vā siṃdhurapara eteṣāṃ tu balaḥ kva cit // 2.10 //
analyzed: baṃdhu vā siṃdhuḥ aparaḥ eteṣām tu balaḥ kva cit

original: tuchubdaś cubukaś caiva babhūvuś ca babhūvuṣī /
analyzed: tuchubdaḥ cubukaḥ ca eva babhūvuḥ ca babhūvuṣī

original: ete sarve parityajya bakāronyonya bhakṣana // 2.11 //
analyzed: ete sarve parityajya

original: // iti dvitīyo 'adhyāyaḥ //
analyzed: iti dvitīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: // dantyoṣṭhavidhiḥ samāptaḥ //
